name: Checkpoint RAGE (demo)
description: This is a decently hard game that I am working on.   It is definitely beatable  . There are over 25 characters and almost 20 hats! I am going to add a lot more levels  that are harder and there is a lot for me to work on (music, Ui, levels, bugs, and much more).  This is basically  a demo of what the game could become.
